Brandon Hundt

About

You’ll typically find Brandon exploring the intersection of Design, Geography, and Sports.

During the weekday, Brandon is the Director of Product Management for PRX, helping to 1) design and define the Roadmap for PRX Dovetail, a full featured podcast post-production platform. 2) Design and develop a news editorial website for The World - Public Radio’s daily world news broadcast.

Brandon has written for PRI.org and City Pages. Follow Brandon on Twitter.
